relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Burst Graphite Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The burst graphite is true to the name as very deep grey-blue colour. The dark tone of this blind is one that works best as a contrast to lighter interiors but could be used in a room of rich browns, reds and gold colours. Be aware that this is a dark toned fabric and can easily be overbearing in the wrong room. Ideal for bathrooms and kitchens, this is a dimout fabric which will filter the light entering your room.

relproducts.title: Burst Shark Grey Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Firm and unyielding, the burst shark grey stands its ground in the window, keeping you safe from peeking eyes and burning sunlight. With such a dark neutral colour, we highly recommend pairing it with a brighter decor, preferably pastel primary colours that add an accent but don't try to beat the rock in a contest of strength, which they would most likely lose. Alternatively, used it to bridge a monochromatic scheme and take the edge out of the white/black contrast.

relproducts.title: Burst Polished Stone Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The light burst polished stone is on the paler side of grey. This is on the subtle side and would look great against a darker decor.
